articles.title: Clinical effectiveness and impact of 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccines in preventing invasive pneumococcal disease among children with risk conditions: A systematic literature review.
articles.summary: PCV13 vaccine effectively prevents invasive pneumococcal disease in children with high-risk conditions like sickle cell disease, HIV, and cancer, reducing infection rates by up to 100%.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
